text: The main road in the village Polkovnik Zhelyazovo (, ) is a village in Krumovgrad municipality, Kardzhali Province, located in the Eastern Rhodope Mountains of southern Bulgaria. it has a population of 1,552 (mainly ethnic Turks) and the mayor is Mustafa Hasan. The village lies at 282 m above sea level. ==References== ==External links== Category:Villages in Kardzhali Province
title: Polkovnik Zhelyazovo
